projectName: Mobility Journey - Progress Dashboard & Trend Detection
description: Build a proper progress dashboard with before/after photo comparisons, AI-powered trend detection across metrics over time, and auto-generated weekly summaries.

userStories.title: Before/after photo comparison view
userStories.description: Add a comparison mode to PhotoTimeline where user can select two photos (same view type, different dates) and see them side-by-side with a slider overlay. Show date delta and any AI analysis differences.

userStories.title: Trend detection engine
userStories.description: Create a server-side function that analyzes metrics history and detects trends: improving, worsening, or stable for each metric. Use statistical methods (rolling averages, direction). Store trend summaries in a new trends table.

userStories.title: Progress dashboard overview tab
userStories.description: Add a new 'Dashboard' tab as the default landing page. Show: days since start, key metrics with trend arrows (↑↓→), latest photo vs earliest photo, recent analysis highlights, protocol compliance percentage.

userStories.title: AI trend insights
userStories.description: Use Claude to generate natural-language trend insights from metrics data. E.g. 'Your left shoulder elevation has improved 3° over the last 2 weeks' or 'Pain levels trending down since starting new exercises'. Show on dashboard.

userStories.title: Auto-generated weekly summary
userStories.description: Create an API endpoint that generates a weekly summary: metrics changes, photos taken, exercises completed, AI analysis highlights. Store in analysis_logs with type 'weekly_summary'. Auto-generate on Sundays or on-demand.

userStories.title: Timeline view
userStories.description: Add a chronological timeline view that interleaves all events: photos, metric entries, analysis notes, completed exercises, weekly summaries. Filterable by type. Shows the full journey narrative.
